properties.headline: Freeze Warning issued February 3 at 4:18AM MST until February 4 at 9:00AM MST by NWS Phoenix AZ
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Freeze Warning, temperatures in the low 30s
expected. For the Hard Freeze Warning, temperatures in the upper
20s expected.

* WHERE...Dripping Springs.

* WHEN...For the Freeze Warning, from midnight tonight to 9 AM
MST Tuesday. For the Hard Freeze Warning, from midnight
Tuesday night to 9 AM MST Wednesday.

* IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other
sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor
plumbing.
properties.instruction:
Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent
freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should
be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have
in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above-
ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

NWSheadline: FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 9 AM MST TUESDAY... ...HARD FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TUESDAY NIGHT TO 9 AM MST WEDNESDAY
